Psychic Detonations.name: Psychic Detonations
Psychic Detonations.flavor: You tap on the floor, and three illusory traps are set under the feet of your enemies.
Psychic Detonations.effect: You bring into being three illusory traps in three separate squares that last until the end of your next turn. Each trap can use the Psychic Detonations Attack power the first time it is triggered.
Psychic Detonations.special: Triggering this attack is considered triggering a trap for the purpose of your sabotage trap power.
Psychic Detonations.requirement: The Psychic Detonations power must be active to use this power.
Psychic Detonations.trigger: A creature starts its turn in or moves adjacent to a square containing a trap
Psychic Detonations.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Sabotage Trap.name: Sabotage Trap
Sabotage Trap.flavor: Sometimes the wrong person triggers the trap. Fortunately, you have an answer for that.
Sabotage Trap.trigger: A creature triggers a trap within range
Sabotage Trap.secondaryTarget: A different creature within 10 squares of the primary target
Sabotage Trap.effect: The primary target and secondary targets swap positions, and the secondary target is considered to have triggered the trap. If the secondary target is you or an ally, he or she gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against that trap’s attacks until the end of the secondary target’s next turn.

Saboteur's Ward.name: Saboteur's Ward
Saboteur's Ward.flavor: You have a punishing response to those who are foolish enough to attack you.
Saboteur's Ward.special: Triggering this attack is considered triggering a trap for the purpose of your sabotage trap power.
Saboteur's Ward.sustainMinor: The zone persists. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you, unless you used your Attune Target path feature to change the origin square of the burst. In that case, you can move the zone 5 squares as a move action.
Saboteur's Ward.requirement: The Saboteur's Ward power must be active to use this power.
Saboteur's Ward.trigger: A creature in the burst makes an attack roll against you
